content.SourceString:
To repair your house, we’ll need you to gather some materials. Please collect 50 wood and 20 stone.

Once you have everything, head to the carpenter and place an order at the counter. Your house will be repaired on the same day!
content.LocalizedString:
To repair your house, we’ll need you to gather some materials. Please collect 50 wood and 20 stone.

Once you have everything, head to the carpenter and place an order at the counter. Your house will be repaired on the same day!

content.SourceString:
Looking for a way to pass the time? Or maybe you want to earn some extra coins while waiting for your crops to grow?

When you have a moment, come visit us at the Beach Shack. We have some welcome gifts for you!
content.LocalizedString:
Looking for a way to pass the time? Or maybe you want to earn some extra coins while waiting for your crops to grow?

When you have a moment, come visit us at the Beach Shack. We have some welcome gifts for you!

content.SourceString:
Afraid I was, when you summoned me. 
But open the path she has, to my home.

This mean, hooman must come visit me.
Understand you will after meet, how to heal island.
 
Left of your farm, my home. If confused, look at drawing I share.

content.SourceString:
The lab is seeking a capable diver to assist with our work. All candidates must complete a compatibility check onsite.

Visit the diving pier to apply.
content.LocalizedString:
The lab is seeking a capable diver to assist with our work. All candidates must complete a compatibility check onsite.

Visit the diving pier to apply.

content.SourceString:
Hey, kid. I’ve noticed the elevator for the Earth shaft now goes down to level 10. I’m aware it was your doing.

Since you’ve shown yourself to be capable, here’s a task: defeat 30 monsters, then swing by our guild once the job is completed. Consider this your entrance exam.

PS: The guild is right beside my house.

content.SourceString:
In just a few days, White Flamingo will open a new boutique in the heart of Starlet Town!

Let us help you find your next new outfit.
content.LocalizedString:
In just a few days, White Flamingo will open a new boutique in the heart of Starlet Town!

Let us help you find your next new outfit.

content.SourceString:
Hooman. Thank you for help me.

I want show our village to you.

I talk to <NPCName>Chieftain</>. <NPCName>Chieftain</> says okay.

I wait.
content.LocalizedString:
Hooman. Thank you for help me.

I want show our village to you.

I talk to <NPCName>Chieftain</>. <NPCName>Chieftain</> says okay.

I wait.

content.SourceString: I need a <Items>hibiscus</> flower. If you have any, please send one my way. A gratuity awaits.
content.LocalizedString: I need a <Items>hibiscus</> flower. If you have any, please send one my way. A gratuity awaits.

content.SourceString: I’m planning on writing an article about the ocean, and I need a bottle of <Items>kelp</> essence. Please let me know if you have one for me to purchase.
content.LocalizedString: I’m planning on writing an article about the ocean, and I need a bottle of <Items>kelp</> essence. Please let me know if you have one for me to purchase.

content.SourceString: Will you be planting tea this Winter? If so, please send some my way. I’d love to send some local tea leaves to my parents.
content.LocalizedString: Will you be planting tea this Winter? If so, please send some my way. I’d love to send some local tea leaves to my parents.

content.SourceString: I lost one of my hats the other day. A powerful gust of wind blew it away. So if you find my <Items>hat</>, kindly return it to me.
content.LocalizedString: I lost one of my hats the other day. A powerful gust of wind blew it away. So if you find my <Items>hat</>, kindly return it to me.

content.SourceString: How’s Fall on Coral Island? A friend is looking for a black trumpet mushroom and will pay a lot of money for it. There should be plenty growing around the lake. If you find any, please save one for me.
content.LocalizedString: How’s Fall on Coral Island? A friend is looking for a black trumpet mushroom and will pay a lot of money for it. There should be plenty growing around the lake. If you find any, please save one for me.

greetclosemessage.SourceString: See you when I get back!
greetclosemessage.LocalizedString: See you when I get back!

content.SourceString: Since you seem to have a lot of tools, would it be okay if I borrowed your pickaxe to fix my easel? When you can, please meet me by my house. Don’t forget the pickaxe!
content.LocalizedString: Since you seem to have a lot of tools, would it be okay if I borrowed your pickaxe to fix my easel? When you can, please meet me by my house. Don’t forget the pickaxe!

content.SourceString:
Would you be able to provide me with a pumpkin? I have a recipe I’d like to try.

Good luck with this busy season. I hope to see you around.
content.LocalizedString:
Would you be able to provide me with a pumpkin? I have a recipe I’d like to try.

Good luck with this busy season. I hope to see you around.

content.SourceString: Can you please help me with a sunflower? <NPCName>Oliver</> and I are making his dad a sunflower crown for his birthday. The problem is we don’t have any sunflowers. You need to deliver it to me before the 26th, okay? Because that’s when his birthday is.
content.LocalizedString: Can you please help me with a sunflower? <NPCName>Oliver</> and I are making his dad a sunflower crown for his birthday. The problem is we don’t have any sunflowers. You need to deliver it to me before the 26th, okay? Because that’s when his birthday is.

content.SourceString: I’m in need of an arapaima. This fish likes colder weather and is usually out after sunset.
content.LocalizedString: I’m in need of an arapaima. This fish likes colder weather and is usually out after sunset.

content.SourceString: Summer has arrived. I was wondering if you’d be planting papayas on your farm. If so, please save some for me. I need two papayas, and I’ll pay a premium for them.
content.LocalizedString: Summer has arrived. I was wondering if you’d be planting papayas on your farm. If so, please save some for me. I need two papayas, and I’ll pay a premium for them.

content.SourceString: I’m planning to make <NpcName>Frank</> his favorite dinner, eggs sunny-side up. Would you sell me some eggs? I’ll be around.
content.LocalizedString: I’m planning to make <NpcName>Frank</> his favorite dinner, eggs sunny-side up. Would you sell me some eggs? I’ll be around.

content.SourceString: I have to admit, I’m writing to you today with an agenda. While shooting video the other day, I spotted several animals stumbling on a large log behind my house. They fell and got hurt. I hate to be a bother, but could you break up the log? I don’t have the right tool, and I need your help on this.
content.LocalizedString: I have to admit, I’m writing to you today with an agenda. While shooting video the other day, I spotted several animals stumbling on a large log behind my house. They fell and got hurt. I hate to be a bother, but could you break up the log? I don’t have the right tool, and I need your help on this.

content.SourceString: I think my box of rocks is STOLEN! I asked Mom and Dad to help me find it, but they don’t play around the island very often. Since I always see you out and about, can you please help? The last time I had it was when me and <NpcName>Zoe</> had a playdate by the lake. I’ll look for it too, but my curfew is at 5 pm, and Mom said I have to eat my vegetables.

I’ll look for it too, but my curfew is at 5 pm, and Mom said I have to eat my vegetables.

content.SourceString: If you have any fresh Spring vegetables, please send something my way.
content.LocalizedString: If you have any fresh Spring vegetables, please send something my way.

content.SourceString: Come to the Beach Shack when you have the time.
content.LocalizedString: Come to the Beach Shack when you have the time.

content.SourceString:
Introducing the Basic Bag. It has a total of twenty compartments. That’s FIVE MORE compartments than a basic tool belt. Carry more, do more, worry less!

Available now at Sam’s General Store for 500 coins.
content.LocalizedString:
Introducing the Basic Bag. It has a total of twenty compartments. That’s FIVE MORE compartments than a basic tool belt. Carry more, do more, worry less!

Available now at Sam’s General Store for 500 coins.

content.SourceString: I say a house isn’t a home until you can cook in it. Joko and I can expand your house and add a nice kitchen. Visit us when you’re ready for an upgrade.
content.LocalizedString: I say a house isn’t a home until you can cook in it. Joko and I can expand your house and add a nice kitchen. Visit us when you’re ready for an upgrade.

content.SourceString: Stop by Socket & Pan and take a look at our kitchen appliances! Each one can help you cook different dishes. Hone your cooking skills and expand your culinary horizons!
content.LocalizedString: Stop by Socket & Pan and take a look at our kitchen appliances! Each one can help you cook different dishes. Hone your cooking skills and expand your culinary horizons!

content.SourceString: If you want to make your life a little easier, you should get a horse! They’re very fast, a real time saver if you travel a lot. Come and see me if you’re interested.
content.LocalizedString: If you want to make your life a little easier, you should get a horse! They’re very fast, a real time saver if you travel a lot. Come and see me if you’re interested.

content.SourceString: I thought I should let you know we can dig you a well if you’d like. It would make farming easier if you had water sources everywhere on your farm.
content.LocalizedString: I thought I should let you know we can dig you a well if you’d like. It would make farming easier if you had water sources everywhere on your farm.

content.SourceString: I can help you upgrade your watering can if you haven’t already. It’ll be able to water more plants than your current one. You’ll need to provide metal bars and pay a fee, but it’s worth it. Trust me!
content.LocalizedString: I can help you upgrade your watering can if you haven’t already. It’ll be able to water more plants than your current one. You’ll need to provide metal bars and pay a fee, but it’s worth it. Trust me!

content.SourceString: As one season ends, another begins. This is a reminder that your crops might wither as the season changes, so don’t forget to harvest them all. The last day of the season is the 28th. Also, stop by Sam’s General Store on the 1st for seeds for the new season!
content.LocalizedString: As one season ends, another begins. This is a reminder that your crops might wither as the season changes, so don’t forget to harvest them all. The last day of the season is the 28th. Also, stop by Sam’s General Store on the 1st for seeds for the new season!

content.SourceString:
You’re really hitting it off with folks, aren’t you?

Just a heads-up – our island has a tradition. If you want to be more than just friends with someone, you should give them a locket. Otherwise, your friend will stay just that, a friend.

Of course, not everyone will be into receiving a locket. Some people are already married or just not interested in romance, you know? So just keep that in mind when you’re tossing lockets around, okay?

Drop by our shop to grab one!

content.LocalizedString: I saw that you completed somebody’s request on the bulletin board. I’m impressed. Thank you for actively taking a part in this community.

content.SourceString: Come to empty cabin in forest. We sell item to you.
content.LocalizedString: Come to empty cabin in forest. We sell item to you.

content.SourceString:
Word travels fast in the archipelago. You have an eye for hard-to-come-by things, while I am a purveyor of rare finds.

The lighthouse, Tues/Thurs/Fri, after sundown. Discreet business only.
content.LocalizedString:
Word travels fast in the archipelago. You have an eye for hard-to-come-by things, while I am a purveyor of rare finds.

content.LocalizedString: Your shiny new tool is ready for pickup! Please come to the shop at your convenience.

content.SourceString: It seems your inventory was full earlier.
content.LocalizedString: It seems your inventory was full earlier.

content.SourceString:
We’re gathering at the lake tomorrow to celebrate the start of Spring. There’s a potluck cookout at the festival, so make sure to bring something yummy!

Arrive between 9 am and 2 pm.
content.LocalizedString:
We’re gathering at the lake tomorrow to celebrate the start of Spring. There’s a potluck cookout at the festival, so make sure to bring something yummy!

Arrive between 9 am and 2 pm.

content.SourceString:
The town is looking for volunteers to attend the Tree Planting Festival tomorrow.

If you’d like to take part, stop by between 8 am and 2 pm. We meet in the forest right behind your farm. 

We’ll start the festival as soon as we have enough volunteers. We could sure use the helping hand of a farmer like you!

We’ll start the festival as soon as we have enough volunteers. We could sure use the helping hand of a farmer like you!

content.SourceString: <PlayerName>$player</>, meet me at the beach west of the diving spot tomorrow evening. See you at 6 pm.
content.LocalizedString: <PlayerName>$player</>, meet me at the beach west of the diving spot tomorrow evening. See you at 6 pm.

content.SourceString:
Fishensips needs a couple of fresh flowers. Would your farm be able to supply them? If so, please have them delivered as soon as possible.

PS: Sam’s doesn't have a good selection. Gah.
content.LocalizedString:

content.SourceString: I made a little extra…
content.LocalizedString: I made a little extra…

content.SourceString: I’m helping my sister-in-law, <NPCName>Erika</>, with her school project. As you know, she sometimes volunteers at the school. She’s teaching the kids how to make a bonfire next week. Will you come to Garden Lane tomorrow morning and help me cut some wood? It’s the area by <NPCName>Millie’s</> house. PS: I’ll bring sandwiches.

content.SourceString: Thank you for helping me yesterday.
content.LocalizedString: Thank you for helping me yesterday.

content.SourceString: Thanks again for the fish. Here’s that free lunch I promised you.
content.LocalizedString: Thanks again for the fish. Here’s that free lunch I promised you.

content.SourceString:
I’m pleased to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of E! It’s not quite up to our previous rank, but I believe we can get there by doing our best to maintain this town we call home.

Now that our rank has increased, distributors are slowly returning. Now you can get new fruit seeds from <NPCName>Sam</>, ducks and goats from <NPCName>Jack</>, whole new categories of furniture, and new clothing from the White Flamingo boutique! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> now has the ability to build a silo to upgrade your coop and barn.

I’d like to thank you for helping us make this happen. I hope you continue to support us in returning this town to its former glory.

I’d like to thank you for helping us make this happen. I hope you continue to support us in returning this town to its former glory.

title.SourceString: Good news about our town rank!
title.LocalizedString: Good news about our town rank!

content.SourceString:
I’m happy to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of D! We’re getting closer to our previous rank, which can only mean good things.

With our rank rising, we’re getting more visitors, and more old distributors are coming back. Now you can get unique seeds from <NPCName>Sam</>, sheep from <NPCName>Jack</>, more new categories of furniture, and new clothing from Wabanana! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> can now build a stable and upgrade your coop and barn.

Thank you once again for your efforts in helping this town. I can see our neighbors regaining their passion for the town. Keep up the good work!

content.SourceString:
The laboratory is now equipped to do more research, especially on upgrades to crops, seeds, and the like.

To find out more, do visit the laboratory if you have the time!
content.LocalizedString:
The laboratory is now equipped to do more research, especially on upgrades to crops, seeds, and the like.

To find out more, do visit the laboratory if you have the time!

content.SourceString: With the town getting livelier and livelier, we finally upgraded our furnace. We can now process more-advanced tools. Please come by and check it out!
content.LocalizedString: With the town getting livelier and livelier, we finally upgraded our furnace. We can now process more-advanced tools. Please come by and check it out!

title.SourceString: Great news about our town rank!
title.LocalizedString: Great news about our town rank!

content.SourceString:
I’m very pleased to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of C! We’re now only one step away from our previous high rank. As you can see, the town’s improvements over the previous weeks have been amazing.

With the town rank increasing, the number of visitors and distributors is increasing too. This is bringing a lot of business to our local merchants. Now you can plant a fruit tree with <NPCName>Sam’s</> help, and he also now sells a larger bag. <NPCName>Jack</> can provide you with pigs and quail. Plus, great new categories of furniture and Wabanana clothing are now available! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> can build a greenhouse and further upgrade your coop and barn.

Thank you very much for your efforts in helping this town get back on its feet!
content.LocalizedString:

title.SourceString: Big news about our town rank!
title.LocalizedString: Big news about our town rank!

content.SourceString:
I’m delighted to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of B! We have regained our previous rank, and our town is now back to its former glory.

With our increase in rank, we have regained our previous number of visitors and distributors! Business is booming! Now you can get Winter seeds from <NPCName>Sam</>, and <NPCName>Jack</> can provide you with peafowl. Also, more categories of furniture and trendy Wabanana clothing are available! <NPCName>Joko</> told me he can now build a fish pond and upgrade your house.

I’d like to express my gratitude for your help in restoring the town to its former glory. Amazing job!

I’d like to express my gratitude for your help in restoring the town to its former glory. Amazing job!

title.SourceString: Important announcement about our town rank
title.LocalizedString: Important announcement about our town rank

content.SourceString:
I’m ecstatic to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of A!

With our outstanding new rank, we’ve recorded a new high in the number of visitors and distributors! Now you can get a supersized bag from <NPCName>Sam</>, luwaks from <NPCName>Jack</>, and excellent new categories of furniture and Wabanana clothing! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> has informed me he can now build an insect pond.

Thank you very much for helping to make this happen for all of us. It wouldn’t be an overstatement to say your role has been significant. Your efforts have inspired others to contribute more to the town, and it shows in our newest town rank. Well done!

Thank you very much for helping to make this happen for all of us. It wouldn’t be an overstatement to say your role has been significant. Your efforts have inspired others to contribute more to the town, and it shows in our newest town rank. Well done!

content.SourceString:
Thanks to your recent contributions that helped the town achieve a higher rank, I now have access to seed splicing. This can help your crops tremendously and increase the variety of your produce.

Do visit the laboratory if you have the time!
content.LocalizedString:
Thanks to your recent contributions that helped the town achieve a higher rank, I now have access to seed splicing. This can help your crops tremendously and increase the variety of your produce.

Do visit the laboratory if you have the time!

content.SourceString:
How are you? I just wanted to check up on your well-being. We heard you’re a farmer now. I hope things are going well with your farm, but if you ever miss your old job, it’s here.

Let’s chat more about this. Hope to hear from you soon.
content.LocalizedString:
How are you? I just wanted to check up on your well-being. We heard you’re a farmer now. I hope things are going well with your farm, but if you ever miss your old job, it’s here.

Let’s chat more about this. Hope to hear from you soon.

content.SourceString:
It is imperative that you return to your position at HyperForce. 

Your contract clearly states that you must provide us with a certain amount of work, which you have not completed to this date.

If you do not fulfill this condition, we will have no choice but to file a lawsuit against you and seek compensation for the damages incurred by your lapse in judgment.

However, we are willing to drop any retaliation against you if you return to work within the week.

Regards,
J. Doe
Senior Manager
content.LocalizedString:
It is imperative that you return to your position at HyperForce. 

Your contract clearly states that you must provide us with a certain amount of work, which you have not completed to this date.

If you do not fulfill this condition, we will have no choice but to file a lawsuit against you and seek compensation for the damages incurred by your lapse in judgment.

However, we are willing to drop any retaliation against you if you return to work within the week.

Senior Manager

content.SourceString:
It embarrasses me to write this, but please, please return to work. We’re falling apart here. We didn’t realize how important you were to our operation.

What would persuade you to come back? An increase in salary? A penthouse apartment? How about a free gym membership? Free lunch and dinner? A personal appeal from me?

You know what? I’ll visit your farm myself and convince you to come back. 

Wait for my arrival, <PlayerName>$Player</>. We’ll talk soon.

Your best friend,
J. Doe
Senior Manager

content.SourceString:
How are you doing, sweetheart? I heard Coral Island is beautiful this time of year. Grandpa, Ashley, and I miss you very much.


PS: Here’s some money for you. It isn’t much, but we hope it’s useful.
content.LocalizedString:
How are you doing, sweetheart? I heard Coral Island is beautiful this time of year. Grandpa, Ashley, and I miss you very much.


PS: Here’s some money for you. It isn’t much, but we hope it’s useful.

content.SourceString: It’s been a while since my last letter. How are you doing there, sweetheart? We miss you every day. Ashley is giving me a hard time lately. She’s refusing her favorite food, and she’s out most nights. Will take her to the vet soon. We made you some klepons, your favorite.
content.LocalizedString: It’s been a while since my last letter. How are you doing there, sweetheart? We miss you every day. Ashley is giving me a hard time lately. She’s refusing her favorite food, and she’s out most nights. Will take her to the vet soon. We made you some klepons, your favorite.

content.SourceString:
How’s the farm, sweetheart? We saw some articles about Coral Island’s Cherry Blossom Festival. The event looked beautiful. I think I might’ve spotted you in one of the photos!

PS: Ashley is pregnant!
content.LocalizedString:
How’s the farm, sweetheart? We saw some articles about Coral Island’s Cherry Blossom Festival. The event looked beautiful. I think I might’ve spotted you in one of the photos!

PS: Ashley is pregnant!

content.SourceString:
It’s been a while since I heard from you, sweetheart. We miss you so much. Your dad said you’re doing well at the farm. It’s great news, and we’re very proud. We baked you some cookies yesterday. Hope they’re still good.

PS: Ashley and the kittens are all healthy. We ended up naming one of them Sandal because he always sleeps right next to my sandals. Your grandpa and I are happy, busy grandparents again.
content.LocalizedString:
It’s been a while since I heard from you, sweetheart. We miss you so much. Your dad said you’re doing well at the farm. It’s great news, and we’re very proud. We baked you some cookies yesterday. Hope they’re still good.

PS: Ashley and the kittens are all healthy. We ended up naming one of them Sandal because he always sleeps right next to my sandals. Your grandpa and I are happy, busy grandparents again.

content.SourceString:
Your parents sent us an article about you making a quarter of a million coins! We’re so happy you’ve found your community and you’re thriving on Coral Island. We sent some extra money to add to the pile! The kittens are taking over our bedroom. We let them sleep there with us. There’s no winning with those cuties.

We’re beyond proud of you, <PlayerName>$Player</>.
content.LocalizedString:
Your parents sent us an article about you making a quarter of a million coins! We’re so happy you’ve found your community and you’re thriving on Coral Island. We sent some extra money to add to the pile! The kittens are taking over our bedroom. We let them sleep there with us. There’s no winning with those cuties.

We’re beyond proud of you, <PlayerName>$Player</>.

content.SourceString:
It’s heartwarming to see you helping out on the island. There were a few folks that weren’t so sure about you moving in. I won’t say who they are, but I will tell you they’ve come to me to say they’ve changed their minds about you.

Keep up the good work!
content.LocalizedString:
It’s heartwarming to see you helping out on the island. There were a few folks that weren’t so sure about you moving in. I won’t say who they are, but I will tell you they’ve come to me to say they’ve changed their minds about you.

Keep up the good work!

content.SourceString: Thank you for helping around the island! The town residents and I wanted to thank you for the way you’ve helped the community. We hope it helps you in some way too.
content.LocalizedString: Thank you for helping around the island! The town residents and I wanted to thank you for the way you’ve helped the community. We hope it helps you in some way too.

content.SourceString: We shouldn’t be surprised at this point, but it still amazes me when I see the amount of work you’ve done for the community. Here’s a little thanks from us. We’re happy you’ve become a part of our charming town.
content.LocalizedString: We shouldn’t be surprised at this point, but it still amazes me when I see the amount of work you’ve done for the community. Here’s a little thanks from us. We’re happy you’ve become a part of our charming town.

content.SourceString: You have completed one hundred errands for the residents of Starlet Town. One hundred! That’s a fantastic thing you’ve done for the community. Thank you!
content.LocalizedString: You have completed one hundred errands for the residents of Starlet Town. One hundred! That’s a fantastic thing you’ve done for the community. Thank you!

content.SourceString: Last night, I spotted you lying face down and got pretty worried! It was dark, and I thought something serious had happened. Anyway, don’t stay up past midnight. It’s not good for your health. I asked Yuri to check on you to be sure you were okay. The medical bill is attached.
content.LocalizedString: Last night, I spotted you lying face down and got pretty worried! It was dark, and I thought something serious had happened. Anyway, don’t stay up past midnight. It’s not good for your health. I asked Yuri to check on you to be sure you were okay. The medical bill is attached.

content.SourceString: You passed out last night from exhaustion. Please don’t push yourself too hard. You’ve got to remember to take breaks and never skip a meal. Here’s the medical bill. I hope you start feeling better soon.
content.LocalizedString: You passed out last night from exhaustion. Please don’t push yourself too hard. You’ve got to remember to take breaks and never skip a meal. Here’s the medical bill. I hope you start feeling better soon.

content.SourceString: I just invented this recipe. I call it Wild Mushroom Polenta. You should try experimenting with it! Just don’t use too many of those brown mushrooms, okay?
content.LocalizedString: I just invented this recipe. I call it Wild Mushroom Polenta. You should try experimenting with it! Just don’t use too many of those brown mushrooms, okay?

content.SourceString: Have you tried baking? It’s a good stress reliever for me, and it might be good for you too. Anyway, here’s a mooncake recipe for you to bake at home. Give it a try!
content.LocalizedString: Have you tried baking? It’s a good stress reliever for me, and it might be good for you too. Anyway, here’s a mooncake recipe for you to bake at home. Give it a try!

content.SourceString: Please enjoy the shredded jackfruit pie recipe enclosed with this message. I only make it with freshly harvested jackfruits, so do keep that in mind.
content.LocalizedString: Please enjoy the shredded jackfruit pie recipe enclosed with this message. I only make it with freshly harvested jackfruits, so do keep that in mind.

content.SourceString: Nothing is better than a burrito full of locally grown ingredients. Here’s a recipe for how to make your own. Hope it’s helpful!
content.LocalizedString: Nothing is better than a burrito full of locally grown ingredients. Here’s a recipe for how to make your own. Hope it’s helpful!

content.SourceString: I’m sending you my favorite fish soup recipe. It was my late wife’s. I hope you like it as much as I do.
content.LocalizedString: I’m sending you my favorite fish soup recipe. It was my late wife’s. I hope you like it as much as I do.

content.SourceString: Have you tried making fried tempeh? I’ve enclosed my recipe if you want to make it. Let me know what you think.
content.LocalizedString: Have you tried making fried tempeh? I’ve enclosed my recipe if you want to make it. Let me know what you think.

content.SourceString: Have you tried making banana fritters? I’ve enclosed my recipe if you want to make it. Let me know what you think.
content.LocalizedString: Have you tried making banana fritters? I’ve enclosed my recipe if you want to make it. Let me know what you think.

content.SourceString: You might want this recipe. It’s for Hawaiian pizza.
content.LocalizedString: You might want this recipe. It’s for Hawaiian pizza.

content.SourceString: This is the recipe for one of my favorite things to cook at home. Easy and delicious! It might be your favorite too.
content.LocalizedString: This is the recipe for one of my favorite things to cook at home. Easy and delicious! It might be your favorite too.

content.SourceString: I hope the farm is treating you well this time of year. Here’s one of my favorite recipes, Fish Tacos. It’s a bit complicated, but I’m sure you’ll ace it.
content.LocalizedString: I hope the farm is treating you well this time of year. Here’s one of my favorite recipes, Fish Tacos. It’s a bit complicated, but I’m sure you’ll ace it.

content.SourceString: I hope the farm is treating you well this time of year. Here's one of my favorite recipes, Vegan Tacos. It’s what I serve at the truck.
content.LocalizedString: I hope the farm is treating you well this time of year. Here's one of my favorite recipes, Vegan Tacos. It’s what I serve at the truck.

content.SourceString: Here’s a recipe I learned from a friend who learned it from another friend who…well, you get it. Thought I’d continue the chain and pass it on to you!
content.LocalizedString: Here’s a recipe I learned from a friend who learned it from another friend who…well, you get it. Thought I’d continue the chain and pass it on to you!

content.SourceString: Here’s the bread recipe we use at Sam’s so you can make your own at home. Might be cheaper to make it yourself!
content.LocalizedString: Here’s the bread recipe we use at Sam’s so you can make your own at home. Might be cheaper to make it yourself!

content.SourceString: Here’s the recipe I use to make tarts. Might be cheaper to make it yourself!
content.LocalizedString: Here’s the recipe I use to make tarts. Might be cheaper to make it yourself!

content.SourceString: A corn on the cob recipe is enclosed for my favorite farmer. Not a grill master for nothing. Ha!
content.LocalizedString: A corn on the cob recipe is enclosed for my favorite farmer. Not a grill master for nothing. Ha!

content.SourceString: Here are instructions for making Kiracha hot sauce. It tastes best when you use fresh ingredients. This one elevates bland meals and gives them quite a kick!
content.LocalizedString: Here are instructions for making Kiracha hot sauce. It tastes best when you use fresh ingredients. This one elevates bland meals and gives them quite a kick!

content.SourceString: Thought I’d share my pad thai recipe. I made it for the family last Sunday, and it was a hit. Let me know what you think.
content.LocalizedString: Thought I’d share my pad thai recipe. I made it for the family last Sunday, and it was a hit. Let me know what you think.

content.SourceString: In case you forget how to smoke a salmon, I wrote down the recipe for you. Here you go.
content.LocalizedString: In case you forget how to smoke a salmon, I wrote down the recipe for you. Here you go.

content.SourceString: Here’s the green smoothie recipe, as promised.
content.LocalizedString: Here’s the green smoothie recipe, as promised.

content.SourceString: Here’s a recipe for making a simple, crunchy lunch – Sautéed Chard.
content.LocalizedString: Here’s a recipe for making a simple, crunchy lunch – Sautéed Chard.

content.SourceString: If you like ramen, try out this recipe for seafood ramen. One of my favorites, absolutely pho-nomenal.
content.LocalizedString: If you like ramen, try out this recipe for seafood ramen. One of my favorites, absolutely pho-nomenal.

greetclosemessage.SourceString: A little noodle joke there for you.
greetclosemessage.LocalizedString: A little noodle joke there for you.

content.SourceString: I found this recipe for oven-baked risotto. It’s probably my mom’s. I thought you might make good use of it.
content.LocalizedString: I found this recipe for oven-baked risotto. It’s probably my mom’s. I thought you might make good use of it.

content.SourceString: Here’s a recipe for roasted chestnuts. I’ve had one too many. Sick of them now, but it’s a great and easy meal to make.
content.LocalizedString: Here’s a recipe for roasted chestnuts. I’ve had one too many. Sick of them now, but it’s a great and easy meal to make.

content.SourceString: This gnocchi recipe is the bomb! Give it a try and tell me what you think.
content.LocalizedString: This gnocchi recipe is the bomb! Give it a try and tell me what you think.

content.SourceString: This pizza recipe is the bomb! Give it a try and tell me what you think.
content.LocalizedString: This pizza recipe is the bomb! Give it a try and tell me what you think.

content.SourceString: Here’s a simple boiled egg recipe.
content.LocalizedString: Here’s a simple boiled egg recipe.

title.SourceString: Recipe: Fried Rice, aka Nasi Goreng
title.LocalizedString: Recipe: Fried Rice, aka Nasi Goreng

content.SourceString: Yesterday, I was reminded of my childhood back in Indonesia. Thought you might want to try my comfort food, fried rice. Or, as we call it, “nasi goreng.”
content.LocalizedString: Yesterday, I was reminded of my childhood back in Indonesia. Thought you might want to try my comfort food, fried rice. Or, as we call it, “nasi goreng.”

content.SourceString: Not sure if you know how to make herbed tempeh. Really simple. Here you go!
content.LocalizedString: Not sure if you know how to make herbed tempeh. Really simple. Here you go!

content.SourceString: Recipe for spider tempura on the back of this letter. It isn’t my first choice for a meal, but it doesn’t taste as bad as it sounds.
content.LocalizedString: Recipe for spider tempura on the back of this letter. It isn’t my first choice for a meal, but it doesn’t taste as bad as it sounds.

content.SourceString: While food can be extravagant, I myself prefer the elegance of simplicity. You should mind what you’re eating. I’m sharing this lettuce wrap recipe with you because I care.
content.LocalizedString: While food can be extravagant, I myself prefer the elegance of simplicity. You should mind what you’re eating. I’m sharing this lettuce wrap recipe with you because I care.

content.SourceString: I tried this onigiri recipe the other day, and it was delicious. It’s written on the other side of this letter if you want to try it.
content.LocalizedString: I tried this onigiri recipe the other day, and it was delicious. It’s written on the other side of this letter if you want to try it.

content.SourceString: I remember you liked the minced jackfruit pie we made at the inn. Here’s the recipe for it! Why don’t you try making it for yourself?
content.LocalizedString: I remember you liked the minced jackfruit pie we made at the inn. Here’s the recipe for it! Why don’t you try making it for yourself?

content.SourceString: I’m mailing you one of our favorite recipes, Hummus. Why don’t you give it a try?
content.LocalizedString: I’m mailing you one of our favorite recipes, Hummus. Why don’t you give it a try?

content.SourceString: I found something I thought you might like. Consider it a little gift from me to you.
content.LocalizedString: I found something I thought you might like. Consider it a little gift from me to you.

content.SourceString:
To address the declining number of tourists on our island, the mayor’s office invited a Funlop Agency representative to rank our town. We’re expecting some sort of award ceremony at the community center.

This is going to be our first-ever town ranking!
Hopefully, the media coverage we get from being a top-rated island will boost our tourism.
content.LocalizedString:
To address the declining number of tourists on our island, the mayor’s office invited a Funlop Agency representative to rank our town. We’re expecting some sort of award ceremony at the community center.

This is going to be our first-ever town ranking!
Hopefully, the media coverage we get from being a top-rated island will boost our tourism.

content.SourceString: Danger – Infested! Do not enter!
content.LocalizedString: Danger – Infested! Do not enter!

Here’s a bag of seeds as a welcome gift from the general store. Why don’t you meet me there, and I can introduce you to the owner, <NpcName>Sam</>? It’s located in the middle of town.

PS: Press M to open the map.

content.SourceString:
We wanted to do something special for you to celebrate our move to Coral Island. Our community outreach team discovered the hot spring wasn’t functional anymore. What a shame!

We couldn’t let that pass, so we sent our brightest scientists and engineers to figure out the problem. We are pleased to inform you that the hot spring is 100% fully functional again! No need to thank us, residents. Your happy, smiling faces are enough thanks for us.
content.LocalizedString:
We wanted to do something special for you to celebrate our move to Coral Island. Our community outreach team discovered the hot spring wasn’t functional anymore. What a shame!

We couldn’t let that pass, so we sent our brightest scientists and engineers to figure out the problem. We are pleased to inform you that the hot spring is 100% fully functional again! No need to thank us, residents. Your happy, smiling faces are enough thanks for us.

content.SourceString: I think it’s time. Come to the pier.
content.LocalizedString: I think it’s time. Come to the pier.

content.SourceString: Send us your login credentials, and we will sort this out for you. Make sure to send the <RickText.Place>password</> – we can’t proceed without it!
content.LocalizedString: Send us your login credentials, and we will sort this out for you. Make sure to send the <RickText.Place>password</> – we can’t proceed without it!

content.SourceString:
I hope you’re settling in well. Seems like now is a good time to let you know about water activities on Coral Island.

When you have time, you should visit <NpcName>Ling</> in the lab to learn more about diving.
Also, <NpcName>Sunny</> at the Beach Shack can tell you a bit about fishing!
content.LocalizedString:
I hope you’re settling in well. Seems like now is a good time to let you know about water activities on Coral Island.

When you have time, you should visit <NpcName>Ling</> in the lab to learn more about diving.
Also, <NpcName>Sunny</> at the Beach Shack can tell you a bit about fishing!

content.SourceString: Send us your login credentials, and we will sort this out for you. Make sure to send the <RickText.Place>password</> – we can’t proceed without it!
content.LocalizedString: Send us your login credentials, and we will sort this out for you. Make sure to send the <RickText.Place>password</> – we can’t proceed without it!

content.SourceString: The museum is opening tomorrow. We’re expecting a crowd, so arrive early. You know what they say, the early bird gets the worm!
content.LocalizedString: The museum is opening tomorrow. We’re expecting a crowd, so arrive early. You know what they say, the early bird gets the worm!

content.SourceString:
We’ve compiled all the coral data you’ve collected while diving, and we’d like to share the results with you.

Do come by the lab if you have time. We can discuss it then.
content.LocalizedString:
We’ve compiled all the coral data you’ve collected while diving, and we’d like to share the results with you.

Do come by the lab if you have time. We can discuss it then.

title.SourceString: Town rank: an idea to increase our popularity!
title.LocalizedString: Town rank: an idea to increase our popularity!

content.SourceString: You’ve given me an idea for increasing our town’s popularity. It involves <NPCName>Sam</>. So meet me at the general store when you can, and I’ll explain it there!
content.LocalizedString: You’ve given me an idea for increasing our town’s popularity. It involves <NPCName>Sam</>. So meet me at the general store when you can, and I’ll explain it there!

content.SourceString: You have cleared the Earth shaft. It’s a great accomplishment! However, a new adventure is on the horizon. A different part of the mine has opened and is waiting for you. Explore to your heart’s content.
content.LocalizedString: You have cleared the Earth shaft. It’s a great accomplishment! However, a new adventure is on the horizon. A different part of the mine has opened and is waiting for you. Explore to your heart’s content.

content.SourceString: We forgot to remove this test mail from the game, so now you should have learned the <RickText.Place>Chest crafting recipe</>.
content.LocalizedString: We forgot to remove this test mail from the game, so now you should have learned the <RickText.Place>Chest crafting recipe</>.

content.SourceString: Meet me in the lab.
content.LocalizedString: Meet me in the lab.

content.SourceString:
We’ve compiled all the coral data you’ve collected while diving, and we’d like to share the results with you.

Please come by the lab when you have time. We have some things to discuss.
content.LocalizedString:
We’ve compiled all the coral data you’ve collected while diving, and we’d like to share the results with you.

Please come by the lab when you have time. We have some things to discuss.

content.SourceString: Hello. This is a <RickText.Place>Side Quest</> test mail. Accept to start the quest.
content.LocalizedString: Hello. This is a <RickText.Place>Side Quest</> test mail. Accept to start the quest.

content.SourceString: Hi. This is a sample <RickText.Place>gift</> for you.
content.LocalizedString: Hi. This is a sample <RickText.Place>gift</> for you.

content.SourceString:
I’m glad to hear the rumors about a new farmer in Starlet Town are true. You’ve been doing excellent work in the fields.

Give this fertilizer a try. Apply it to tilled soil. It’ll increase your chances of harvesting higher-quality crops, which will fetch more coins when it’s time to sell.
content.LocalizedString:
I’m glad to hear the rumors about a new farmer in Starlet Town are true. You’ve been doing excellent work in the fields.

Give this fertilizer a try. Apply it to tilled soil. It’ll increase your chances of harvesting higher-quality crops, which will fetch more coins when it’s time to sell.

content.SourceString:
It looks like you’re ready for this. This is a basic sprinkler.

Place it in your field, and it’ll water some of your crops for you. The best part? You can craft as many of these as you need, as long as you have the necessary materials.
content.LocalizedString:
It looks like you’re ready for this. This is a basic sprinkler.

Place it in your field, and it’ll water some of your crops for you. The best part? You can craft as many of these as you need, as long as you have the necessary materials.

content.SourceString: Good news! We’re ready to launch our Pickstarter campaign, but we can’t do it without you! Come by the museum so we can launch it together.
content.LocalizedString: Good news! We’re ready to launch our Pickstarter campaign, but we can’t do it without you! Come by the museum so we can launch it together.

content.SourceString:
I can’t believe this. We actually reached our Pickstarter goal in just one day! Oh man, this is so exciting. I didn’t think we’d get there so fast! 

Since we hit our goal so early, we’re adding some stretch goals for the campaign. Basically, our museum is going to be bigger and grander than originally planned! But I’ll have to talk to Mayor <NPCName>Connor</> and <NPCName>Millie</> about this.

I’ll update you again soon.
content.LocalizedString:
I can’t believe this. We actually reached our Pickstarter goal in just one day! Oh man, this is so exciting. I didn’t think we’d get there so fast! 

Since we hit our goal so early, we’re adding some stretch goals for the campaign. Basically, our museum is going to be bigger and grander than originally planned! But I’ll have to talk to Mayor <NPCName>Connor</> and <NPCName>Millie</> about this.

I’ll update you again soon.

content.SourceString:
I can’t believe it. People are still donating. <NPCName>Millie</> and I talked about it, and we want to honor the backers. We’ll have a new room in the museum with the names of all the contributors engraved on the walls and statues for the higher-level backers. We’re calling it the Founders’ Hall.

We want this to be a grand memento of the people who’ve helped us get to this point.

Exciting things are happening, <PlayerName>$player</>.
content.LocalizedString:
I can’t believe it. People are still donating. <NPCName>Millie</> and I talked about it, and we want to honor the backers. We’ll have a new room in the museum with the names of all the contributors engraved on the walls and statues for the higher-level backers. We’re calling it the Founders’ Hall.

We want this to be a grand memento of the people who’ve helped us get to this point.

Exciting things are happening, <PlayerName>$player</>.

content.SourceString:
Well. It’s official. The campaign is closed, and we reached four times our original goal! It’s blowing my mind! I’m running out of words to describe how I feel.

We’ll start construction on the Founders’ Hall as soon as possible. We’ll have an opening party and everything!

I’ll come get you on the day of the grand opening.
content.LocalizedString:
Well. It’s official. The campaign is closed, and we reached four times our original goal! It’s blowing my mind! I’m running out of words to describe how I feel.

We’ll start construction on the Founders’ Hall as soon as possible. We’ll have an opening party and everything!

I’ll come get you on the day of the grand opening.

content.SourceString: I’d like to run an idea by you about local produce. Meet me at the general store when you have time.
content.LocalizedString: I’d like to run an idea by you about local produce. Meet me at the general store when you have time.

content.SourceString: I wanted to give you this recipe for Spring frittata as a little gift. Don’t let the name fool you. You can make this any time of the year, as long as you have the ingredients.
content.LocalizedString: I wanted to give you this recipe for Spring frittata as a little gift. Don’t let the name fool you. You can make this any time of the year, as long as you have the ingredients.

content.SourceString: I’ve heard making butter croissants can be difficult, but I believe this recipe will make it much easier for you. Mother has used this recipe many times, and I can vouch for it.
content.LocalizedString: I’ve heard making butter croissants can be difficult, but I believe this recipe will make it much easier for you. Mother has used this recipe many times, and I can vouch for it.

content.SourceString: Do you know how to make guacamole? If not, here’s a simple recipe for you! Hope you like it!
content.LocalizedString: Do you know how to make guacamole? If not, here’s a simple recipe for you! Hope you like it!

content.SourceString: How are you doing? Eating healthy meals every day, I hope. If you want to add something new to your rotation, here’s a recipe for one of my favorite meals.
content.LocalizedString: How are you doing? Eating healthy meals every day, I hope. If you want to add something new to your rotation, here’s a recipe for one of my favorite meals.

content.SourceString: Have you ever had eggplant lasagna? It’s delicious! I got this recipe from one of my friends, who lives abroad. I’m not much of a cook, but this is a pretty easy recipe. Why don’t you give it a try?
content.LocalizedString: Have you ever had eggplant lasagna? It’s delicious! I got this recipe from one of my friends, who lives abroad. I’m not much of a cook, but this is a pretty easy recipe. Why don’t you give it a try?

content.SourceString: How are you doing? I was leafing through our family cookbook, and this recipe for clam chowder just fell out! None of us uses this recipe often, and Mom said I can give it to you. Better than wasting it, right?
content.LocalizedString: How are you doing? I was leafing through our family cookbook, and this recipe for clam chowder just fell out! None of us uses this recipe often, and Mom said I can give it to you. Better than wasting it, right?

content.SourceString: I found this outside. Is it yours?
content.LocalizedString: I found this outside. Is it yours?

content.SourceString: Just checking in with you. I have this recipe for sweet potato poutine if you want to try making it. It’s my go-to comfort meal. Try it out!

content.SourceString: I’ve seen you around the island fishing. Here’s a recipe for sashimi. You can use any fish.

content.SourceString:
It seems like you’re ready for this. This is a mayonnaise machine. Just place any egg into this here gizmo, and it’ll produce mayonnaise. And just like that, you’ve made an artisan product!

Artisan products are made using artisan machines, and they fetch a nice profit. They’re great gizmos to have on your farm, ya hear?

content.SourceString:
I wanted to let you know the island ferry express is now running again. 

What is it, you ask? It’s me and my boat, and I take you into the waters. You can visit nearby islands, where you might have some friends you’d like to visit. 

Where is it, you ask? Remember where I dropped you off your first day here? That’s where.

Dear residents of Starlet Town,

The animal shelter is now officially open. We have a variety of adorable pets you can take home. Visit us at the community center, first room on the right. I guarantee you won’t leave empty handed!

Hey, there, <PlayerName>$player</>,

Looks like you’re making some really special connections.

If things are getting serious and you’re considering marriage, we have an island tradition for that. You’ll want to propose to your special someone with a diamond ring.

Does this sound like you? If so, drop by our shop and grab one!

content.SourceString:
I’ve been watching your progress, and I must say, your fishing skills are outstanding! I’m so glad you accepted our welcoming gifts when you first moved to the island. 

To help you level up even more, I’m sending you another special gift – a fish pond. With this pond, you’ll be able to breed fish and continue to increase your skills.
content.LocalizedString:
I’ve been watching your progress, and I must say, your fishing skills are outstanding! I’m so glad you accepted our welcoming gifts when you first moved to the island. 

To help you level up even more, I’m sending you another special gift – a fish pond. With this pond, you’ll be able to breed fish and continue to increase your skills.

title.SourceString: You’ve got a real knack for catching bugs!
title.LocalizedString: You’ve got a real knack for catching bugs!

content.SourceString:
I couldn’t help but notice how awesome you are at catching insects! I’m so glad you’ve been using the welcoming gifts we gave you when you moved in. 

To keep that momentum going, I’m gifting you an insect house. You’ll be able to breed insects and become a true bug-catching master!
content.LocalizedString:
I couldn’t help but notice how awesome you are at catching insects! I’m so glad you’ve been using the welcoming gifts we gave you when you moved in. 

To keep that momentum going, I’m gifting you an insect house. You’ll be able to breed insects and become a true bug-catching master!

content.SourceString:
I’ve been working on automation and quality-of-life devices! They’ll make things easier for you on the farm.

Here’s a prototype of one of them, the auto fertilizer. This nifty gadget can be attached to your sprinklers, and when loaded with fertilizer, it’ll automatically disperse it in the surrounding soil.

I can make the blueprint if you provide me with materials for R&D. This will allow you to craft it using basic materials. If you’re interested, come by the lab to see some of the prototypes for other devices I’ve made.
content.LocalizedString:
I’ve been working on automation and quality-of-life devices! They’ll make things easier for you on the farm.

I can make the blueprint if you provide me with materials for R&D. This will allow you to craft it using basic materials. If you’re interested, come by the lab to see some of the prototypes for other devices I’ve made.

The Harvest Festival is coming up on Fall 15 at 7 pm in Alun-Alun Square. Legendary farmer Jeff Smith will be the judge for the harvest display contest. To enter, bring your best products from each of the following six categories:
- Vegetables
- Fruits
- Flowers
- Coop products
- Barn products
- Artisan products

content.LocalizedString: It’s finally time to say goodbye to Stephen. Please come to the beach at 6 pm if you’re able. I don’t think I can do this alone.

content.LocalizedString: Do you want to go on a date with me? If so, I’ll be at the beach at sunset.

Have you ever done sound healing?

Join me in the forest at noon. It’s therapeutic.

I think I’m being watched.

Whenever I’m around the villa late at night, I feel like somebody is trying to talk to me.

When I look back, nothing is there.

Do you believe in ghosts? I’m not sure I do, but meet me at the villa around 8 pm.

We will catch this thing. Will you tell <NPCName>Scott</> about it too?

Maybe you can come to the Tavern this evening at 7 pm and meet my friends.

We’re going to have so much fun.

Don’t make me go to your farm and get you!

I request your presence in my chambers. There’s a ritual the spirits urge me perform on your behalf that will be worth your while.

I request your presence in my chambers. There’s a ritual the spirits urge me perform on your behalf that will be worth your while.

content.SourceString: You were out cold yesterday, so I took you to the clinic. They said you’ve just pushed yourself to the limit. They also handed me your bill, so I’m passing it along. It’s in the envelope.
content.LocalizedString: You were out cold yesterday, so I took you to the clinic. They said you’ve just pushed yourself to the limit. They also handed me your bill, so I’m passing it along. It’s in the envelope.

content.SourceString: Pal, you scared the daylights out of me yesterday. Seeing you passed out like that – it was really frightening! The doctors said it’s extreme fatigue. Please take it easy today. I’ve got your hospital bill here as well. It’s right inside the envelope.
content.LocalizedString: Pal, you scared the daylights out of me yesterday. Seeing you passed out like that – it was really frightening! The doctors said it’s extreme fatigue. Please take it easy today. I’ve got your hospital bill here as well. It’s right inside the envelope.

content.LocalizedString: You passed out yesterday. I got you to the hospital. You need to take better care of yourself. Check the back of this letter for your bill.

content.SourceString: I saw you out cold yesterday and rushed you to the hospital. Pretty scary stuff, to be honest. Hope you’re back on your feet soon. Your hospital bill is tucked behind this letter.

Guess what? You weren’t at the Harvest Festival! But that’s okay. Maybe competitions just aren’t your thing.

You seemed a little shy when we first met, right? It’s all good, though, buddy.

Daddy always used to say, “Courage is the first step to victory.” Looks like you’re still trying to find your shoes, huh?

Don’t sweat it, though. If you’re ever in Beluga Bay, drop by and check out my trophy. It’s pretty cool.

content.SourceString:
So you won this time, huh? Well, I guess everyone needs their day in the sun.

But don’t get too cozy up there. You’ve just fired me up to push even harder.

Daddy once told me, “Bobby, winning is temporary, but being a winner is forever.” And believe me, next year, I’m reclaiming my victory.

Enjoy your moment, <PlayerName>$Player</>. Because next year, it’s Bobby time!

You put in some effort, but, well, there’s something about Beluga Bay. It’s got that special magic.

Catch you later.

A draw? With you? I gotta be honest, I didn’t see that coming. But, hey, even a broken clock is right twice a day, right?

I’ve already got big plans for next year, and there’s no room for sharing the spotlight.

So you better start your prep now, ’cause I’m certainly revving up my engine!

This is an occasion you won’t want to miss!

content.SourceString: I want to send you this trophy as a token of our appreciation. You were the major contributor to our town's rank increasing to A. We hope you will display it proudly!
content.LocalizedString: I want to send you this trophy as a token of our appreciation. You were the major contributor to our town's rank increasing to A. We hope you will display it proudly!

content.SourceString:
Exciting news! With the town now at rank D, we’ve received more grants. That means more advanced quality-of-life devices to help you out!

Check this out: we now have the Auto Petter and the Sturdy Computer. The Auto Petter takes care of your animals, and the computer? It has online shopping!

I have the blueprints ready, but I’ll need materials for R&D. Drop by the lab to see other gadgets that are now available.

I have the blueprints ready, but I’ll need materials for R&D. Drop by the lab to see other gadgets that are now available.

content.SourceString:
With the town climbing up to rank C, our funding has seen a bump. That means even cooler quality-of-life gadgets for the farm are now on the table!

Let me introduce you to a couple: the Auto Chest and the Ultimate Scarecrow. The Auto Chest automates your production and can even turn into a conveyor belt. The scarecrow? It covers a 19x19 field!

As usual, I’ve drafted up the blueprints, but I’ll need specific materials for R&D. Swing by the lab when you can.

content.SourceString:
We’re thrilled to introduce two mythical pets to the Coral Island world: dragon and lembus! 

Enclosed is a special transformation kit that holds the power to unlock these mythical companions in-game.

Here’s how it works: 

Simply give this item to your regular pet and witness the enchantment as they magically transform into either a dragon or a lembus. And don’t forget, if you ever want to revert them to their original form, you can easily remove the outfit.

content.SourceString:
Please accept this sake.

Thank you for your help with packing the other day.

We truly gained a star the day you decided to move here.

content.SourceString:
Our kingdom is about to embark on an important project called the "Starlet Expedition," and we need your help.

Given your unique experience as a human living in Starlet Town, we believe you could provide valuable insights into this venture.

Please join us at the Palace to discuss the details.

I got a lead that it might be in a cave, not too far from the Sleepy Eel.
But here's the catch – it's a bit of a tricky spot, known for its twisty tunnels and curious creatures. 
Meet me at my house at noon.

content.SourceString: I’d love to go back to Starlet Town. Maybe you can take me to that cafe for a date? You did promise, after all. See you there tonight at 7.

content.LocalizedString: Enclosed is my latest creation, the Oceanic Mojito, crafted especially for you. Enjoy this refreshing blend of the sea's finest flavors.

content.SourceString: Congratulations on your wedding! Please accept these oranges as a gift for your wedding. We hope they bring you and <PlayerName>$Player</> good fortune and great luck in your journey together. May these fruits symbolize a vibrant and prosperous life ahead.

content.SourceString: Congratulations on your wedding! To add a touch of comfort to your new beginnings, I've gotten you two a new bed as a present. I wasn't entirely sure what to get you, but I thought you might need a bigger bed now that you two are sharing.

content.SourceString: Gotta say, my ads in Sam's sure worked. Married man now, Charles. Well, here's my advance payment for the rent. Thanks for letting me stay, bro.

content.SourceString: Congratulations on your wedding! To celebrate this big day and help y'all start this new chapter, we're sendin' over 15,000c. Just remember, no matter how far life takes you, our roots and love are always with you.

content.LocalizedString:
Word travels fast—congrats on your engagement! That’s no small thing.
If you haven’t picked out what you’re wearing yet, swing by White Flamingo. We’ve got a fresh collection of wedding dresses and suits, perfect for the big day.

Just a heads-up: better grab your outfit before the wedding. Last-minute shopping is never a good look.

content.SourceString:
Whispers of your engagement have reached even the coral bloom—congratulations, shimmering soul.
Tidal Threads now carries wedding outfits. Stop by to find something special for your big day.

Be sure to get your outfit before the wedding!
